page.title: 01OVERVIEW OF SPALDWICK AREA
page.content: Our area is mainly farm land,with mainly cereal crops,rape,and some potatoes.There are three villages here.Spaldwick,Easton,and part of Ellington.The villages are small.There is to be no new housing development in Spaldwick,but Ellington's population is still growing.The majority of people moved into this area because it has easy access to London and is close to the A1.A new road is to be built soon joining the A1 to the M1.There is only a small amount of light industry in the area.There is one primary school in the area which takes the children from seven villages.The children are brought to school on two buses.When they leave the children go to a comprehensive school which is about seven miles away.
